lead_paragraph: England seamer James Anderson is confident that he has enough skill and experience to compensate for his decreased pace over the remaining years of his cricket career.

headline.print_headline: Anderson Keen to Forge on Despite Drop in Pace
headline.main: Anderson Keen to Forge on Despite Drop in Pace

snippet: England seamer James Anderson is confident that he has enough skill and experience to compensate for his decreased pace over the remaining years of his cricket career....
